participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative, friendly, and a bit introverted. Enjoys quiet nights at home with her pets as well as playing music.
participant_1.background: I play the guitar. I like to go for runs. I live by myself. I have a dog and two cats. I like country music.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Energetic, adventurous, and optimistic. Believes in making the most of life and cherishes time spent with loved ones.
participant_2.background: I am 5 3 and love movie time. I am a fitness guru. I am a carefree, funloving, free spirited person. I am a true believer in god first. I love adventure that is why I have been a sales person all my life.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1.
Hello! I'm participant_2.
It's nice to meet you!
It's nice to meet you too!
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go for runs, go to the movies, and spend time with my family.
Those sound like fun things to do! I love to play the guitar, go for runs, and spend time with my dog and cats.
That's great! I've always wanted to learn how to play the guitar.
It's a lot of fun! I've been playing for a few years now, and I'm still learning new things.
That's awesome! I'm sure I would be terrible at it, but I'd like to try it anyway.
I'm sure you'd be great at it! You should give it a try.
I might just do that!
What kind of movies do you like to watch?
I like to watch all kinds of movies, but I especially love action movies and comedies.
Those are two of my favorite genres too! I also love watching horror movies and documentaries.
I love horror movies too! I'm not so much into documentaries, but I'll watch them if they're about something I'm interested in.
That's fair. What's your favorite movie of all time?
That's a tough question! I have a lot of favorites, but I think I'd have to say The Lord of the Rings trilogy.
Those are great movies! I've seen them all a few times.
Me too! They're always good to watch.
What's your favorite TV show of all time?
That's a tough question too! I have a lot of favorites, but I think I'd have to say The Office.
That's a great show! I've seen all of the episodes.
Me too! It's so funny.
What's your favorite book of all time?
That's a tough question! I have a lot of favorites, but I think I'd have to say The Catcher in the Rye.
That's a great book! I've read it a few times.
Me too! It's so good.
